CustomField.formula:
CASE(1,
IF(( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) < DATE(2020,12,17)),1,0),'Dezembro 2020',
IF(( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2020,12,17) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) <= DATE(2021,01,20)),1,0),'Janeiro',
IF(( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2021,01,21) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) <= DATE(2021,02,17)),1,0),'Fevereiro',
IF(( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2021,02,18) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) <= DATE(2021,03,22)),1,0),'Março',
IF(( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2021,03,23) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) <= DATE(2021,04,19)),1,0),'Abril',
IF(( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2021,04,20) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) <= DATE(2021,05,20)),1,0),'Maio',
IF(( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2021,05,21) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) <= DATE(2021,06,21)),1,0),'Junho',
IF(( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2021,06,22) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) <= DATE(2021,07,20)),1,0),'Julho',
IF(( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2021,07,21) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) <= DATE(2021,08,20)),1,0),'Agosto',
IF(( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2021,08,23) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) <= DATE(2021,09,21)),1,0),'Setembro',
IF(( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2021,09,22) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) <= DATE(2021,10,20)),1,0),'Outubro',
IF(( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2021,10,21) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) <= DATE(2021,11,19)),1,0),'Novembro',
IF(( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) >= DATE(2021,11,20) && DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) <= DATE(2022,12,17)),1,0),'Dezembro',
' ')
CustomField.label: Competência de cadastro
